name: Tiny Angry Electric Guitar! Game - Guitar Tap Mania Games
name_original: Tiny Angry Electric Guitar! Game - Guitar Tap Mania Games
description:
Play as one of four groovy guitars! Collect tone knobs to unlock new stuff! Game is unique and addictive.
Music by Zeke Lindgren is enough to make you want play this game for hours!
Only on Apple Devises.
